Newbie Helper:
Did you forget about the task? Quickly look for Blue Gemstone. To get a gem, you need to win Gremlins.
Attack the Gremlin's, as I recently explained to you. Hover over the Gremlin and press the left button. The cursor changes to a sword. With the change of the cursor click the left mouse button and attack.
When you're done with it, I'll give you something useful as a gift. So, good luck.
